name: NSKeyValueChange
desc: The kinds of changes that can be observed.

items.name: case setting
items.desc: Indicates that the value of the observed key path was set to a new value. This change can occur when observing an attribute of an object, as well as properties that specify to-one and to-many relationships.

items.name: case insertion
items.desc: Indicates that an object has been inserted into the to-many relationship that is being observed.

items.name: case removal
items.desc: Indicates that an object has been removed from the to-many relationship that is being observed.

items.name: case replacement
items.desc: Indicates that an object has been replaced in the to-many relationship that is being observed.
